data.title: Directory – Deerfield Academy
data.text:
During the school day, for non-emergency issues, please email or telephone your child’s Class Deans at their office number listed below. After hours, please contact the School Officer in Charge (SOC) at 413-772-9070

Dean of Students, Sam Bicknell 413-774-1485

Dean of Residential Life, 12th Grade Dean, Becca Melvoin 413-774-1423

11th Grade Dean, Brian Barbato 413-774-1681

10th Grade Dean, Drew Philie 413-774-1543

9th Grade Dean, Heather Brown 413-774-1459

Associate Head of School for Student Life, Amie Creagh 413-774-1454

Whistleblower Hotline

The Academy maintains a toll-free, independently staffed whistleblower hotline, available 24 hours a day. All calls to the hotline are confidential. You can reach the hotline at 833-619-4400.
